greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of elements of the group GL(2, Z(n)) with order k, 1 <= k <= A316565(n).
comment: For coprime p,q the group GL(p*q, Z(n)) is isomorphic to the direct product of the two groups GL(p, Z(n)) and GL(q, Z(n)).
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8660 (first 40 rows)
formula: T(p*q,k) = Sum_{i>0, j>0, k=lcm(i, j)} T(p, i)*T(q, j) for gcd(p, q)=1.
program: MatOrder(M)={my(id=matid(#M), k=1, N=M); while(N<>id, k++;N=N*M); k}

row(n)={my(L=List()); for(a=0, n-1, for(b=0, n-1, for(c=0, n-1, for(d=0, n-1, my(M=Mod([a, b; c, d], n)); if(gcd(lift(matdet(M)), n)==1, my(t=MatOrder(M)); while(#L<t,listput(L,0)); L[t]++ ))))); Vec(L)}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Jul 06 2018
